mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_main_people tmp where 1 = 1

select tmp.people_sn , tmp.lang_code , tmp.people_nm , tmp.people_dept , tmp.cn_pc , tmp.cn_mo , tmp.atch_id_pc as imageAtchIdPc , ( select physicl_flpth from tb_atch where atch_id = tmp.atch_id_pc ) image_flpth_pc , tmp.atch_id_mo as imageAtchIdMo , ( select physicl_flpth from tb_atch where atch_id = tmp.atch_id_mo ) image_flpth_mo , tmp.view_yn , tmp.sort_ordr , tmp.regist_dt , tmp.register_sn , ( select user_nm from tb_user where user_sn = tmp.register_sn ) register_nm , tmp.updt_dt , tmp.updusr_sn , ( select user_nm from tb_user where user_sn = tmp.updusr_sn ) updusr_nm from tb_main_people tmp where view_yn = 'Y'

tmp.sort_ordr asc,
tmp.people_sn desc

select tmp.people_sn , tmp.lang_code , tmp.people_nm , tmp.people_dept , tmp.cn_pc , tmp.cn_mo , tmp.atch_id_pc as imageAtchIdPc , ( select physicl_flpth from tb_atch where atch_id = tmp.atch_id_pc ) image_flpth_pc , tmp.atch_id_mo as imageAtchIdMo , ( select physicl_flpth from tb_atch where atch_id = tmp.atch_id_mo ) image_flpth_mo , tmp.view_yn , tmp.sort_ordr , tmp.regist_dt , tmp.register_sn , ( select user_nm from tb_user where user_sn = tmp.register_sn ) register_nm , tmp.updt_dt , tmp.updusr_sn , ( select user_nm from tb_user where user_sn = tmp.updusr_sn ) updusr_nm from tb_main_people tmp where tmp.people_sn = #{peopleSn}
